channel.description: https://theeburgerdude.com/marry-me-tofu/ Two blocks super firm tofu Marinade: 1/4C mayo 1/4C soy sauce 1/4C Nooch 1t Onion Powder 1t Garlic powder 1t smoked paprika 2T hot sauce 2T water 1t vinegar Dredge in flour Sauce: 1/2C Raw Cashews (cover in boiling water for 10 minutes) 1C unsweetened plant mylk 2T Vegan butter 5 Cloves minced garlic 1T Italian seasoning 1t calabrian chiles (or red pepper flakes) 2C vegan chickâ€™n broth 1T Dijon mustard (Edmond Fallot preferred over grey poupon)
